replies.body:
{{sticker:sg-syndra}} 

Happy April fools day suckas

{{champion:17}} 
Don't step on me, don't step on me, don't step on me
Tbh i know its an april fools thing, But i actually kinda want this, i totally wanna talk with the enemy adc about their day and stuff ;3
i know right, that would be awesome, its a shame riot so good at april fools...
Well.. you think it would be awesome, until you discover that all every enemy adc has been doing all day is 'visiting' your mom.
trueee! that would be so neat! and who doesnt love small chitchat right before you wreck their tower? :3

Great. Now i actually want this. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I don't care if this is an April Fools Joke, this legit needs to be a thing, like yesterday!{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
So, yet again Riot uses a joke Sp4zie made years ago. Amazing content this year too guys.

So.... can talk to enemies, but not randoms in the party to be able to tell them MIA's from lane, asking for assistance, letting people know you're rotating.

Also, just another way to get trolled in game when you have the deathbush set up and some wingnut decides to say something to spook them.

Please, get rid of this functionality, I don't think you realise how truly toxic the 10 year olds in this game are.
PLEASE actually make this a thing, obviously add a mute option but PLEASE
What do bots say?
i swear i played all for one jax with you yesterday :|
You did, think it was for some event quest, and I recall getting completely steam-rolled XD
i played all for one jax yesterday, was it against heimer?

ah fk... thought this was legit even called my gran over to have
 a look at this cool new feature of the game... only to end up in sorrow hanging round the comment section..

I saw the announcement in game new lobby home page, whatever its called.  And was like YAY i can talk to my adc as support without being in a premade!  then i opened the article, oh silly me its April 1st.
WOW, talk about checking the date, I was equally excited and 'oh no', can't believe I was dumb enough to believe this was happening lol nice
Dat Sion thoooooo
i've been april fooled >:(
NICE PRANK
Legit cringe

This is the best/worst idea ever. Now I can ear rape my opp to make them afk but also I have to deal with them 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
